content.text:
# Flag of the Transcaucasian Socialist Federative Soviet Republic

The Flag of the Transcaucasian Socialist Federative Soviet Republic (, ) was adopted by the Transcaucasian Socialist Federative Soviet Republic in 1925. It consists of a red star bordered by gold in the canton, surrounded by a semicircle with the cyrillic characters "ЗСФСР" in gold.
Prior to 1925, the flag was red with the Cyrillic characters  in gold.
